title: Google Veo 3 Generative AI Video
description: This course offers comprehensive insights into Google Veo 3 generative AI video software and its applications. It guides learners through the process of designing and creating AI-powered video content using the software.
learningObjectives: Understand the concept of generative AI video
Apply generative AI video in real-world scenarios

finalProjectDetails.overview: The final project requires learners to create a generative AI video using Google Veo 3.
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit the script and the video file through the online submission portal.
